summary: A small player home situated west of Windhelm, once populated by a poor Hunter by the name Levi Highlander.
descriptionHtml:
A small player home situated west of Windhelm, once populated by a poor Hunter by the name Levi Highlander.


[b]DISCLAIMER[/b]
This is my first mod ever, a hut built for some nice place to stay which isn't Riverwood or close to Whiterun.
I don't know much about modding, but it wasn't too hard. I've tested it myself and it works fine for me. If you find any bugs or stuff, please tell me.

You may not do your own things with this hut. I may allow permissions for other mods I do, but this hut is mine. If you wish to translate it, contact me because I have no idea about stuff like that.

I know the lighting is a bit ... Strange at places, mostly around the staircase, shining through to the upper level. I don't know how to fix this. I might figure out in the future.


[b]What's in there?[/b]
- Smithing facilities, except Smelter
- Alchemy Table
- Enchanting Table
- Numerous Chests
- Two Beds
- Some clutter
- Shrines
- Navmesh


[b]What's Not in there?[/b]
- Smelter
- Free gold (Not much at least)
- Mannequins
- Weapon Racks


[b]Where is it?[/b]
West of Windhelm, on the west shore of the Lake south of Bronze Water Cave. South of Nightgate Inn, North of Irkngthand.


[b]Compatibility[/b]
As far as I know, it should be compatible with pretty much everything, since it's not close to any cities that tend to house a lot of mods.
The wood piles and the fires should work with Frostfall.


[b]Requirements[/b]
- Skyrim (duh).
- Nothing else. No DLC's, no other mods.

[b]Credits[/b]
Levi, without whom this Hut would not exist.
Peeh, my first tester.
author: Tamardia
